projects.name: Hollow Orbit
projects.description: A 3D open world mech game set after the events of the book 'When Neptune Wakes', where the player explores an alien world, fights enemies, completes quests, and decides the fate of the planet while grappling with their own identity and purpose. The intention is to see if an AI can code an entire AAA game with guidance.
